data.rationale:
Clip is based on Leendert Ammeraal's CLIP.CPP as presented in his
    book 'Programming Principles in Computer Graphics' which in turn is
    based on Cohen-Sutherland line clipping. I feel many might find it
    easy to use and useful for writing "wireframe" 2D video games,
    particularly for collision detection. I demonstrate how to use
    Vector2D in the script LunarLander.pl.
